Hero.subtitle: Transform Your Fleet Operations with AI-Powered Intelligence that Drives Innovation, Efficiency, and Growth.

Pricing.sectionSubtitle: Simple, transparent pricing. No hidden fees.

basicPlan.name: Basic Plan
basicPlan.ideal: Ideal for small fleets and startups seeking essential tracking and foundational management tools.

standardPlan.name: Standard Plan
standardPlan.ideal: Ideal for growing businesses requiring advanced monitoring, efficiency tools, and enhanced safety features.

proPlan.name: Pro Plan
proPlan.ideal: Ideal for large enterprises needing comprehensive fleet management, advanced analytics, and deep integration capabilities.

unlimitedPlan.name: Unlimited Plan
unlimitedPlan.ideal: Ideal for very large fleets and organizations requiring bespoke solutions, maximum control, and premium support.

Features.sectionTitle: Our Designed Features for Enterprise Success
Features.sectionSubtitle: Innovative Tools That Scale With Your Business

feature1.title: Real-time Fleet Intelligence
feature1.desc: Advanced GPS tracking with AI-powered analytics provides comprehensive visibility across your entire fleet. Monitor vehicle location, status, and performance metrics from a unified dashboard that evolves with your operational needs.
feature1.label: Fleet Tracking

feature2.title: Predictive Maintenance Management
feature2.desc: Transform reactive maintenance into proactive fleet care. Our AI algorithms analyze vehicle data to predict maintenance needs before they cause downtime, extending asset lifespan and optimizing resource allocation.
feature2.label: Predictive Maintenance

feature3.title: Driver Performance Optimization
feature3.desc: Enhance safety and efficiency through AI-driven driver behavior analysis. Identify training opportunities, recognize top performers, and implement continuous improvement programs based on actionable insights.
feature3.label: Driver Performance Analytics

feature4.title: Fuel Consumption Intelligence
feature4.desc: Reduce fuel costs and emissions with advanced consumption monitoring and optimization. Identify inefficiencies, track fuel usage, and driving behaviors to implement targeted improvement strategies.
feature4.label: Eco

feature5.title: Compliance & Safety Automation
feature5.desc: Streamline regulatory compliance with automated documentation and reporting. Ensure adherence to industry standards while maintaining comprehensive safety protocols across your entire operation.
feature5.label: Compliance & Safety

feature6.title: Enterprise Analytics & Reporting
feature6.desc: Transform fleet data into strategic business intelligence. Generate customizable reports, visualize performance trends, and leverage predictive analytics to drive continuous operational improvement.
feature6.label: Dashboard

stat1.label: Reduction
stat1.desc: in operational costs through advanced analytics and route optimization.

stat2.label: Satisfaction
stat2.desc: customer satisfaction rate with real-time tracking and service reliability.

stat3.label: Improvement
stat3.desc: in fleet management efficiency and asset utilization.

stat4.label: Increase
stat4.desc: in driver retention and safety compliance.
